item.title: Apple and Samsung Push Back Against Xiaomi's Bold India Ads
item.description: Apple and Samsung have reportedly issued cease-and-desist notices to Xiaomi in India for an ad campaign that directly compares the rivals’ devices to Xiaomi’s products. The two companies have threaten
